original_text: You know that I have worked very hard for your father. I have worked as well as I can.
korean_text: 그대들도 알거니와 내가 힘을 다하여 그대들의 아버지를 섬겼거늘

sentences.original_text: You know that I have worked very hard
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 내가 아주 열심히 일했다는 것을 알고 있어

sentences.original_text: I have worked as well as I can
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 할 수 있는 최선으로 일했어
